function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Introduction of exotic species causing new allergies among urban residents","Impact":"Increased allergic sensitization and potential development of new allergens","Mitigation":"Careful control and selection of new exotic species, planting insect-pollinated plants, and consulting with experts","Technologies":"Consulting with botanist/palynologists, pollen monitoring technology","People":"Urban residents, individuals allergic to pollen","Owner":"City planning authorities, landscape architects"},{"Description":"High levels of air pollutants in urban areas","Impact":"Toxic effects on respiratory tract, adjuvant effect on respiratory hypersensitivity, and increased likelihood of pollen allergies","Mitigation":"Developing guidelines for planting low-allergy impact green areas, controlling allergic potential of new exotic species","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring, pollution control technology","People":"Urban residents, individuals with respiratory conditions, individuals allergic to pollen","Owner":"Environmental agencies, city planning authorities"},{"Description":"Mechanical interaction between air pollutants and pollen grains","Impact":"Triggering release of allergen-containing granules from pollen and increasing bioavailability of airborne allergens","Mitigation":"Improved air quality, use of pollution control technology, careful selection of greenery in urban areas","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring, pollution control technology","People":"Urban residents, individuals allergic to pollen","Owner":"Environmental agencies, city planning authorities"}]}
